<<<<<<< HEAD
Cardinal Mazarin's letters to Lewis XIV, the present King of France, on his love to the Cardinal's niece together with his secret negotiation with Don Lewis D'Haro, chief minister to the King of Spain. Correspondence. English. Selections Mazarin, Jules, 1602-1661. Louis XIV, King of France, 1638-1715. Méndez de Haro, Luis, 1598-1661.
[11], 286, [2] p. : port.
Printed for R. Bentley ..., London : 1691.
A collection of letters written in 1659. Reproduction of original in British Library.
=======
